name: Complete The Pattern #7 - Cyclical Permutation
description:
### Task:

You have to write a function which creates the following pattern (See Examples) upto desired number of rows.

If the Argument is `0` or a Negative Integer then it should return `""` i.e. empty string.

### Examples:

`Argument: 9`

    123456789
    234567891
    345678912
    456789123
    567891234
    678912345
    789123456
    891234567
    912345678

`Argument: 11`

    1234567891011
    2345678910111
    3456789101112
    4567891011123
    5678910111234
    6789101112345
    7891011123456
    8910111234567
    9101112345678
    1011123456789
    1112345678910

Note: There are no spaces in the pattern

Hint: Use `\n` in string to jump to next line
